<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shifter Prosthesis](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1369)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 73</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 210 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This prosthetic arm is imbued with transmutation magic that can transform it into a weapon.
